meanings.sent1: The cake was unexceptional, tasting like any other cake.
meanings.sent2: She lived an unexceptional life, working a regular job and coming home to her family.
meanings.sent3: His unexceptional jokes always made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The unexceptional weather matched his uneventful mood.
meanings.sent5: The unexceptional scenery failed to impress the tourists.

meanings.definition: Not worthy of special attention or notice.
meanings.sent1: The movie was unexceptional, quickly forgotten by the audience.
meanings.sent2: Her unexceptional outfit blended in with the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The unexceptional plant in the corner somehow stole the show.
meanings.sent4: His unexceptional talent shone brightly in the small town.
meanings.sent5: The unexceptional speech failed to captivate the listeners.
